features.description: You have not created the form yet. Add some consent form, just click create new consent form button and go ahead.

disvover.description: Getting start of your journey with our data management tools. This brief guide will introduce you to our powerful PDPA application, helping you simplify data management and compliance with the PDPA Act.

board.description: You can easily craft consent forms, and automatically generate them from specified master data. Tailor them to your needs, experiment with themes, and have the world at your fingertips with real-time previews. Then, share your creations effortlessly via QR codes or URLs.
board.decription2: Control over consent-related parameters, including purpose, purpose categories, and mandatory fields, ensuring data integrity and accuracy in the system.

signIn.forgotDescription: Please enter an email linked to your account. We’ll send a link that will sign you into the app instantly.
signIn.resendDescription: We have sent you an email to reset your password. If you do not receive another email Please press send again.

consentForm.warningPurpose: If you don't consent, we can't use your data for this purpose.

main.explain: This screen shows a list of Mandatory field created by the user. You can click on the mandatory field name to view more details about the mandatory field. If you want to create a mandatory field template for a mandatory field, you can click the 'Create Mandatory ' button.

customfields.explain: This screen shows a list of Custom field created by the user. You can click on the custom field name to view more details about the custom field. If you want to create a custom field template for a custom field, you can click the 'Create Custom field ' button.
customfields.title: Custom field

purpose.explain: This screen shows a list of Purposes created by the user. You can click on the Purposes name to view more details about the Purposes. If you want to create a Purposes template for a Purposes, you can click the 'Create Purpose ' button.
purpose.title: Purpose

purposeCategory.explain: This screen shows a list of Purpose category created by the user. You can click on the purpose category name to view more details about the purpose category. If you want to create a purpose category template for a purpose category, you can click the 'Create Purpose category ' button.

intro.title: Request form for exercising the rights of the owner of personal data
intro.description: The Personal Data Protection Act of 2019 gives personal data owners the right to request the right to exercise their personal data which is in the care of the Company. As the controller of personal data You can exercise these rights by filling in the details in this request form.

dataRequester.ApplicantAds: Applicant is the agent of the data subject.

powerVerification.title: Documents proving authority to act on behalf of
powerVerification.subtitle: I hereby attach the following documents for the purpose of verification of power, identity and residency of the applicant and the data subject in order for the Company to proceed the exercise of rights accurately.

identityVerification.title: Documents for verification of identity and/or residency
identityVerification.subtitle: I hereby attach the following documents for the purpose of verification of power, identity and residency of the applicant and the data subject in order for the Company to proceed the exercise of rights accurately.
identityVerification.copyOfIdentificationCare: Copy of identification care (for Thai nationality)

requestReason.title: I would like to submit a request for the following purposes.
requestReason.impossibleToIdentifyYourself: Makes it impossible to identify yourself

condition.title: Data Controller disclaimer
condition.subtitle: In order to comply with the relevant laws, the Company may have to deny your request in some cases including but not limited to the following cases where:
condition.decription:
1)You are not able to clearly verify that the applicant is the data subject or authorized to submit the request.
2)Your request is unreasonable, e.g., the applicant may not have the right to delete personal data or the Company does not have such personal data.
3)Such request is redundant, e.g., such request is repeatedly submitted or duplicated without reasonable reason.
4)Retention of such personal data is for establishing legal claims, legal compliance, exercise of legal rights or defenses.
5)Proceeding your request may adversely affect and harm rights and freedom of other people.
6)Processing of such personal data is necessary for performance of contracts between the data subject and the Company.
7)Processing of such personal data is necessary for legitimate interests of the Company.
8)Other cases prescribed by the relevant law. In general, you will not be charged for the process in relation to the request. However, if your request is manifestly unreasonable or redundant, the Company may charge a processing fee at a reasonable cost.

acknowledge.title: Acknowledgment and Acceptance is require
acknowledge.subtitle: The applicant has read and understood this form thoroughly. The applicant confirms that the information provided to the Company is true and accurate. The applicant understands that the verification of authorization, identification and residency is necessary for processing your request. Providing false information with bad faith may result in legal prosecution. In order to properly proceed with your request, the Company may request for additional information from you for verification purpose.
